remarks: An irreflexive, transitive, linear relation is a strict ordering. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jan-1996.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)
statement:
issoi.1 $e |- ( x e. A -> -. x R x ) $.
issoi.2 $e |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. A /\ z e. A ) -> ( ( x R y /\ y R z ) -> x R z ) ) $.
issoi.3 $e |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. A ) -> ( x R y \/ x = y \/ y R x ) ) $.
issoi $p |- R Or A $.
$d A x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
